fields.description:
Hi i am learning mobile development ,i have gone thorough the below link but it does not contain enough information please help to create hello world windows hybrid application


https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Windows+Phone+8+Module+Development+Guide
fields.summary: i want to create hello world windows hybrid application in titanium stdio i have just done with titanium stdio setup please tell me the steps to create.

comments.body: Hi i have created on sample app using titanium alloy project please tell me the steps to run the app in windows simulator or device please help

Hello Saamer! 

This is the kind of question that should go directly to the Q&A section of the developer site. 

http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest

In the meantime, please follow this instructions to run your first test with windows hybrid:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/Getting+Started+with+the+Windows+Phone+SDK

Please open a thread on the Q&A and let us know how this goes! 

Best,

Mauro

This is not a bug. This should be a question in the Q&A website:

http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest
